subject: Sailboats and Sailing
Boats and Boating
lead_paragraph: The Swiss team Alinghi rejected a proposal from BMW Oracle Racing for an America’s Cup race in monohull boats, saying it was preparing to race BMW Oracle in multihulls as soon as May 2010.
snippet: The Swiss team Alinghi rejected a proposal from BMW Oracle Racing for an America’s Cup race in monohull boats, saying it was preparing to race BMW Oracle in multihulls as soon as May 2010.
